entries.name: BRAirbrush
entries.description: A soft round brush that builds up over time instead of stroke distance.

entries.name: BRBend Boundary Cloth
entries.description: Bend only open boundaries of the mesh, folding the surrounding geometry in the process.

entries.name: BRBend/Twist Cloth
entries.description: A pose brush that rotates geometry.

entries.name: BRBlend Hard
entries.description: Similar to Average brushes in other modes with a hard round falloff. Used to blend colors along the stroke.

entries.name: BRBlend Soft
entries.description: Similar to Average brushes in other modes with a soft round falloff.

entries.name: BRBlend Square
entries.description: Similar to Average brushes in other modes with a hard square falloff.

entries.name: BRBlob
entries.description: Magnifies the mesh as you draw. Useful for an additional inflation effect on the stroke.

entries.name: BRBoundary
entries.description: Transform specifically mesh boundaries with various deformations.

entries.name: BRClay
entries.description: Similar to the Draw brush but with a flattening effect and subtle smoothing. Useful for polishing and building volumes.

entries.name: BRClay Strips
entries.description: The same as the Clay brush, but more aggressive with a square falloff. A common standard for building rough volumes.

entries.name: BRClay Thumb
entries.description: Specifically for emulating the effect of running your thumb over surfaces. Pushes geometry in and sideways.

entries.name: BRCrease Polish
entries.description: A Draw brush with a pinching effect. Useful for polishing existing creases or carefully creating new ones.

entries.name: BRCrease Sharp
entries.description: Much sharper and stronger Crease brush. Great for creating thin and deep pinches.

entries.name: BRDensity
entries.description: Cleans up geometry by collapsing short edges. Specifically for use with Dynamic Topology.

entries.name: BRDrag Cloth
entries.description: Nudges the geometry along the surface while minimally affecting the overall shape of the object.

entries.name: BRDraw
entries.description: The standard brush for pushing vertices inwards and outwards from the surface direction.

entries.name: BRDraw Sharp
entries.description: Same as Draw but with a much sharper Falloff. Useful for creating creases and sharp angles.

entries.name: BRElastic Grab
entries.description: Used to simulate realistic deformations from grabbing of Elastic objects.

entries.name: BRElastic Snake Hook
entries.description: Similar to Elastic Grab but rotates affected geometry based on the stroke direction.

entries.name: BRErase Multires Displacement
entries.description: Remove displacement information on a Multiresolution modifier.

entries.name: BRExpand/Contract Cloth
entries.description: Creates compression or stretching on geometry.

entries.name: BRFace Set Paint
entries.description: Paint new, smooth or extend existing Face Sets.

entries.name: BRFill/Deepen
entries.description: Pushes surfaces upwards towards a flat plane. Useful for filling in holes and crevices. Alternatively deepens existing holes.

entries.name: BRFlatten/Contrast
entries.description: Pushes vertices to an average height to create a flat surfaces. Alternatively pushes them away from the center for more contrast.

entries.name: BRGrab
entries.description: Moves vertices along with the mouse. An essential brush for building shapes and adjusting proportions.

entries.name: BRGrab 2D
entries.description: Similar to Grab but with an infinitely projected falloff. Useful for grabbing broader shapes and giving a similar feel to using Liquify tools in image painting applications.

entries.name: BRGrab Cloth
entries.description: Grabs geometry within the brush radius firmly, while surrounding geometry is being simulated to follow.

entries.name: BRGrab Planar Cloth
entries.description: Similar to Grab Cloth but with a line as the brush radius instead of a circle.

entries.name: BRGrab Random Cloth
entries.description: Similar to Grab Cloth but with a noise texture applied to create more random variation.

entries.name: BRGrab Silhouette
entries.description: Similar to Grab but only affects vertices with the normal facing sideways away from the view. Very useful for adjusting outer silhouettes of thin objects.

entries.name: BRInflate Cloth
entries.description: Inflates the geometry outwards or inwards.

entries.name: BRInflate/Deflate
entries.description: Moves the mesh in multiple direction. Useful for inflating or shrinking surfaces and volumes.

entries.name: BRLayer
entries.description: Draw with a fixed height. Useful for adding flat layers to a surface.

entries.name: BRMask
entries.description: Paints a selection on parts of the mesh to be unaffected by other brushes.

entries.name: BRNudge
entries.description: Similar as 'Thumb' but dynamically picks up vertices like the 'Snake Hook'. Useful for nudging something along the mesh surface.

entries.name: BRPaint Blend
entries.description: A mix of a 'Paint' and 'Blend' brush. On low pen pressure the brush averages colors and with high pen pressure it paints colors.

entries.name: BRPaint Hard
entries.description: A simple hard round falloff brush for painting.

entries.name: BRPaint Hard Pressure
entries.description: A hard round falloff with pressure sensitivity for the brush radius.

entries.name: BRPaint Soft
entries.description: A soft round falloff with pressure sensitivity for only the strength.

entries.name: BRPaint Soft Pressure
entries.description: A soft round falloff with pressure sensitivity for both radius and strength.

entries.name: BRPaint Square
entries.description: A hard square brush falloff for painting.

entries.name: BRPinch Folds Cloth
entries.description: Pinches only from two perpendicular sides along the stroke direction, creating parallel folds along the stroke.

entries.name: BRPinch Point Cloth
entries.description: Pinches geometry to the center point of the radius, creating folds from all sides.

entries.name: BRPinch/Magnify
entries.description: Pulls vertices towards the center of the brush. Useful for polishing angles and creases. Alternatively pushes them away from the center.

entries.name: BRPlateau
entries.description: Similar to Flatten but with a locked orientation and depth to create a consistently flat surface.

entries.name: BRPose
entries.description: Simulating an armature-like deformations. Useful for quick posing and transformations.

entries.name: BRPull
entries.description: Iteratively picks up and lets go of geometry like the Snake Hook, but much softer. Useful for subtle small scale deforming over longer strokes.

entries.name: BRPush Cloth
entries.description: Pushes geometry inwards or outwards.

entries.name: BRRelax Pinch
entries.description: Similar to the Relax Slide brush but pinches/relaxes geometry instead.

entries.name: BRRelax Slide
entries.description: Slides the topology of the mesh in the direction of the stroke while preserving the geometrical shape of the mesh. Alternatively smoothes the mesh on 'Shift'. Also useful for redistributing topology where it is needed.

entries.name: BRScrape Multiplane
entries.description: Scrapes the mesh with two angled planes at the same time, producing a sharp edge between them.

entries.name: BRScrape/Fill
entries.description: Pushes surfaces inwards. Alternatively fills surfaces while holding 'Ctrl'. This is the most common brush for flattening meshes.

entries.name: BRSharpen
entries.description: Pinches the colors inwards to create sharp edges or points.

entries.name: BRSmear
entries.description: Smears colors along the stroke.

entries.name: BRSmear Multires Displacement
entries.description: Smear displacement information on a Multiresolution modifier.

entries.name: BRSmooth
entries.description: Smooths out irregularities in the surface and shrinks volumes by averaging the vertices positions.

entries.name: BRSnake Hook
entries.description: Pulls vertices along with the stroke to create long, snake-like forms. Geometry is rotated and magnified to allow continuous pulling. Ideally used with Dynamic Topology.

entries.name: BRStretch/Move Cloth
entries.description: A pose brush that translates and scales geometry.

entries.name: BRThumb
entries.description: Same as 'Grab' but moves vertices along the surface direction. Useful for preserving specific surfaces.

entries.name: BRTrim
entries.description: Pushes surfaces inwards toward a locked direction. The depth can be defined by going deeper towards surfaces along the stroke.

entries.name: BRTwist
entries.description: Rotates vertices within the brush in the direction mouse.

entries.name: BRTwist Boundary Cloth
entries.description: Twist open boundaries of the mesh, creating twisting folds.
